TEXT.English: Your unit uncovers a weapon from past ages, the Ancient Bow.
TEXT.French: Your unit uncovers a weapon from past ages, the Ancient Bow.
TEXT.German: Your unit uncovers a weapon from past ages, the Ancient Bow.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit uncovers a weapon from past ages, the Ancient Bow.
TEXT.Spanish: Tu unidad encuentra un arma de eras pasadas, el Arco Ancestral.

TEXT.English: In the depths of the lair, your unit finds a group of corpses kneeling in front of a throne. Sitting in the throne, another long-dead body is holding a magic jewel.
TEXT.French: In the depths of the lair, your unit finds a group of corpses kneeling in front of a throne. Sitting in the throne, another long-dead body is holding a magic jewel.
TEXT.German: In the depths of the lair, your unit finds a group of corpses kneeling in front of a throne. Sitting in the throne, another long-dead body is holding a magic jewel.
TEXT.Italian: In the depths of the lair, your unit finds a group of corpses kneeling in front of a throne. Sitting in the throne, another long-dead body is holding a magic jewel.
TEXT.Spanish: En las profundidades de la guarida, tu unidad encuentra a un grupo de cadáveres arrodillados en frente de un trono. Sentado en dicho trono, otro cadáver antiguo sujeta una joya mágica.

TEXT.English: Hidden under a pile of rubble, your unit finds a Heart Amulet.
TEXT.French: Hidden under a pile of rubble, your unit finds a Heart Amulet.
TEXT.German: Hidden under a pile of rubble, your unit finds a Heart Amulet.
TEXT.Italian: Hidden under a pile of rubble, your unit finds a Heart Amulet.
TEXT.Spanish: Bajo una pila de escombros, tu unidad encuentra un Amuleto Corazón.

TEXT.English: After overcoming a powerful desire to flee, your unit manages to retrieve a Menacing Helm from the lair.
TEXT.French: After overcoming a powerful desire to flee, your unit manages to retrieve a Menacing Helm from the lair.
TEXT.German: After overcoming a powerful desire to flee, your unit manages to retrieve a Menacing Helm from the lair.
TEXT.Italian: After overcoming a powerful desire to flee, your unit manages to retrieve a Menacing Helm from the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: Tras superar un poderoso deseo de huir, tu unidad consigue recuperar un Casco Amnazador.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Hauberk of Abjuration.
TEXT.French: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Hauberk of Abjuration.
TEXT.German: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Hauberk of Abjuration.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Hauberk of Abjuration.
TEXT.Spanish: Tu unidad descubre un antiguo artefacto,la Armadura de Abjuración.

TEXT.English: Your unit finds an arcane relic from the times of ancient Patria.
TEXT.French: Your unit finds an arcane relic from the times of ancient Patria.
TEXT.German: Your unit finds an arcane relic from the times of ancient Patria.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit finds an arcane relic from the times of ancient Patria.
TEXT.Spanish: Tu unidad encuentra una reliquia arcana procedente de los tiempos de Patria.

TEXT.English: Your unit finds an ancient weapon from the Age of Dragons, the Wyrmslayer.
TEXT.French: Your unit finds an ancient weapon from the Age of Dragons, the Wyrmslayer.
TEXT.German: Your unit finds an ancient weapon from the Age of Dragons, the Wyrmslayer.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit finds an ancient weapon from the Age of Dragons, the Wyrmslayer.
TEXT.Spanish: Tu unidad encuentra un arma antigua de la Edad de los Dragones, la Matadragones.
